text:
You can set the section to full width with 0 padding in the template, but if they create a DND section then they need to set the section settings manually.

The column can exist and still have the module full width as long as the section settings are properly configured. As far as I know columns default with no padding (unless your dev added to the theme as an override) so that shouldn't need to be manually updated.

Thanks, <@U03AKL6Q1B2>! I'm the dev for our project. What I'm hoping to do is restrict our content editors from dragging and dropping content side by side. We don't want the option of Columns at all. Any chance there is a way to do that?
Unfortunately not, the DND editor options can't be restricted.
